title: Food trucks heading to MIA (pre-security, of course)
text:
Food trucks heading to MIA (pre-security, of course) 
Rotating lineup of food trucks to show up every other Friday 
Trucks to set up in parking lot outside Central Terminal’s E concourse 
First up: Ms. Cheezious, Che Grill and Moty’s Grill Miami International Airport will have food trucks on site in a parking area every other Friday. Miami International Airport Ms. Cheezious is one of the first food trucks that will serve lunch at Miami International Airport. The truck will be on site Friday. Pedro Portal El Nuevo Herald 1 of 2 Order Reprint of this Story 
Before they hit the skies, travelers can grab a meal on wheels Friday at Miami International Airport. 
Food trucks — specifically Ms. Cheezious , Moty’s Grill and Che Grill — are scheduled to set up in the parking area outside the E concourse. That’s by the airport’s central terminal. Lunch is served from 11 a.m. until 2 p.m. 
The airport will host more trucks — two or three at a time — every other Friday “to add even more diversity to its growing menu of dining options,” according to an announcement. Related content
